statements: UPDATE logs SET is_suspicious = TRUE, log_time = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE log_id = 1;
UPDATE logs SET query_text = 'SELECT * FROM users;', user_id = 5 WHERE log_id = 2;
UPDATE logs SET query_text = 'New Query Text', is_suspicious = true WHERE log_id = 123;
UPDATE logs SET log_time = '2023-01-01 08:00:00', user_id = 456 WHERE log_id = 789;
UPDATE logs SET db_user='admin' WHERE log_id=1;
UPDATE security_alerts SET alert_type='Malware' WHERE alert_id=2;
UPDATE logs SET db_user = 'John Doe', query = 'SELECT * FROM customers;' WHERE log_id = 1;
UPDATE security_alerts SET alert_type = 'Data Breach', alert_description = 'Sensitive data leaked', log_id = 2 WHERE alert_id = 1;
UPDATE logs SET timestamp = '2022-05-10 15:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE suspicious_activity SET severity = 3, query_text = 'SELECT * FROM records' WHERE user_id = 10;
UPDATE logs SET timestamp = '2022-05-15 12:30:00', query_text = 'Updated query text', user_id = 12345 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE suspicious_activity SET severity = 3, timestamp = '2022-05-20 08:45:00', user_id = 54321, query_text = 'Suspicious query updated' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE logs SET username='John Doe' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE user_details SET role='Admin' WHERE user_id=100;
UPDATE logs SET action = 'Viewed Dashboard', details = 'No anomalies found' WHERE id = 123
UPDATE user_details SET full_name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 456
UPDATE logs SET log_message = 'Updated message' WHERE log_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE activities SET activity_type = 'Login', activity_timestamp = '2022-01-10 08:00:00' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE logs SET log_message = 'Updated log message' WHERE log_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE users SET password = 'new_password' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
